name: Goblin Gambler
description:
IMPORTANT - IF YOU GO BANKRUPT REFRESH THE PAGE TO START A NEW GAME - SORRY FOR THE BUG IT'LL BE FIXED SOON

Climb your way out of gambling debts - by gambling! Place bets on combatants in the fight pit.

But your fate isn't left to chance. You get to play as the combatant you put your money on!

Controls:

AIM with mouse cursor

WASD / Arrow keys to move

LMB to use basic attack

RMB to use ability 1

E to use ability 2

(Goblin Gambler was made in a 3-day period by myself and BirdCatThatcher for the 95th MiniJam!)

(I uploaded the WebGL build after the submission deadline, however I did not modify any of the code so it's the same version as v0.2.3 which I submitted on time)
